ActAuditor General Act
PrecisRequest to the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA to audit, on an annual basis, the annual financial statements of the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada, commencing with the fiscal year beginning on April 1, 2002 and ending on March 31, 2003.
